Author: throwowoway998881
Text: Bloating is the no.1 reason people look fat, nobody's being delusional that's literally the truth.

Author: WinonaQuimby
Text: Hey friend, a gentle reminder that this is well within a healthy range of weight fluctuation.  It's not anything you did. It's not stored as body fat. The logical part of your brain knows this - listen to it :)  But to speak to the last part of your post, yeah. You're falling deeper and deeper into your ED as you lose weight. Also, the smaller you are, the more sensitive you are to regular digestive bloating and water retention. Please be kind to yourself. No one sees what you see.
